title: Customise cloudwatch alarm emails
description: Customise cloudwatch alarms with lambda, ses and HTML templates

introBox.headline: How it works
text: The SAM template deploys a Lambda function with permission to publish events to EventBridge. The Lambda function publishes an event to the default bus in EventBridge when invoked.
